title: Get the IAM policy for a data policy
description: Gets the IAM policy for a specified data policy. The policy defines the roles and members that have access to that data policy resource.

objective.narrative: This sample is for developers building auditing or access management automation. For example, a script can use this method to fetch the IAM policy for each data policy and verify that it complies with organizational access rules.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatapolicy_v2beta1_datapolicyservice_iampolicy_get
regionTags.title: Get the IAM policy for a data policy
regionTags.description: Gets the IAM policy for a specified data policy. The policy defines the roles and members that have access to that data policy resource.
